Damage_Resistance.display_help: Mother Mayhem is resistant to some forms of damage.
Damage_Resistance.display_target_help: Mother Mayhem is resistant to some forms of damage.

Psionic_Blast.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and increasing recharge time.
Psionic_Blast.display_target_help: Your recharge rate has been reduced!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Psionic_Crush.display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.
Psionic_Crush.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and losing endurance!

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} holds you with her {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Subdue.display_help: You lash out in an effort to subdue the weaker mind of your foes. This causes psionic damage and has the potential to immobilize your foes.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Will_Domination.display_help: You attempt to dominate the will of an enemy, causing them psionic damage and potentially causing them to be put to sleep.
Will_Domination.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Sleep {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Sleeps you with their {PowerName}.

Psychic_Wail.display_help: Psionic Storm is a devastating attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left stunned.
Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: You are stunned and your recharge rate has been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: You unleash a whirling vortex of psionic energy at your target, causing the target and those near them to be afflicted with moderate damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets are knocked into the air and suffer reduced recharge rate.
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and reduced recharge rate!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Psionic_Break.display_help: You slash at your target, mentally injuring them. The target takes psionic damage and experiences reduced regeneration. Their mind makes the pain of the slash real, causing the target to also suffer lethal damage as they start to bleed.
Psionic_Break.display_target_help: Your regeneration rate has been reduced and you are bleeding!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Psionic_Pulse.display_help: You unleash a powerful psionic shockwave that ripples through the air around you, dealing Psionic and Smashing damage to any hit by the wave. The shockwave also has a chance to knockback its targets.
Psionic_Pulse.display_target_help: You are knocked off your feet!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Judgement.display_help: You hold your target in judgement with your whip, preventing them from moving. While they helplessly tremble under your gaze, you are healed while they suffer damage and are healed less effectively.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.
{PowerName} weighs heavily upon you, dealing {Damage} points of psionic damage and increasing your resistance to healing. The damage you suffer returns to {PlayerSource}, healing her.

Aura_of_Psychosis.display_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura than can drive enemies insane.
Aura_of_Psychosis.display_target_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura than can drive enemies insane.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} strikes you for {Damage} points of psionic damage and debilitates your mind.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Confuse {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Confuses you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Terrorize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Terrorizes you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Scare {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Scares you with their {PowerName}.

Aura_of_Pain.display_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura that can cause damage and weaken her enemies to further psionic attacks. This attack also renders enemies affected by it susceptible to the secondary effects of Aura of Psychosis.
Aura_of_Pain.display_short_help: High DMG (Psionic), -Res(Foe; Psionic), -Def(Foe; AoE, Psionic), Special
Aura_of_Pain.display_target_help: Shalice Tilman's disembodied mind projects a powerful aura that can cause damage and weaken her enemies to further psionic attacks. This attack also renders enemies affected by it susceptible to the secondary effects of Aura of Psychosis.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} strikes you for {Damage} points of psionic damage and lowers your defenses!

Mass_Levitate.display_help: You can send multiple targets violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground.
Mass_Levitate.display_target_help: You have been knocked down and your ability to fly is hindered.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Grant_Portal_Disintegration.display_help: Mother Mayhem's control over Aurora's mind is nearly absolute. One of the ways this manifests is in her ability to continuously the tenuous links to Aurora's mind. Each portal Aurora opens will be disintegrated by Mother Mayhem quickly if left unattended.
Grant_Portal_Disintegration.display_target_help: Mother Mayhem's control over Aurora's mind is nearly absolute. One of the ways this manifests is in her ability to continuously the tenuous links to Aurora's mind. Each portal Aurora opens will be disintegrated by Mother Mayhem quickly if left unattended.

Portal_Disintegration.display_help: Mother Mayhem's control over Aurora's mind is nearly absolute. One of the ways this manifests is in her ability to continuously the tenuous links to Aurora's mind. Each portal Aurora opens will be disintegrated by Mother Mayhem quickly if left unattended.
Portal_Disintegration.display_target_help: Mother Mayhem's control over Aurora's mind is nearly absolute. One of the ways this manifests is in her ability to continuously the tenuous links to Aurora's mind. Each portal Aurora opens will be disintegrated by Mother Mayhem quickly if left unattended.

Psionic_Lightning.display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Morale.display_help: You are deep within the recesses of Mother Mayhem's mind! Her terrifying presence drains the morale out of you as you stand and face her - weaken her to regain your confidence!
Morale.display_target_help: You are deep within the recesses of Mother Mayhem's mind! Her terrifying presence drains the morale out of you as you stand and face her - weaken her to regain your confidence!
